Debugging symbols are turned off in your Ant build's javac.  In the javac task, set debug="true"

Scott Stirling
Macromedia

> -----Original Message-----
> From: randy.carey@... [mailto:randy.carey@...]
> 
> I'm running JUnit from IntelliJ.  When reviewing the JUnit 
> stack trace, I
> noticed that only those files compiled directly by IntelliJ 
> showed line
> numbers,   For those classes that I compiled by running my 
> own Ant file
> (instead of IntelliJ's built-in compiler), I get "Unknown 
> Source" in place
> of a line number.
> 
> Any ideas as to why this is happening?  Am I missing 
> something in my Ant
> file?  Is my IntelliJ configured differently so that it 
> produces this extra
> information?
> 
> --Randy
